question: CAMPA fund, that was seen in news recently, is associated with which Union Ministry?
option1: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
option4: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers welfare
answer: Ministry of Environment, Forests and Climate Change
explanation:
Union Minister of Environment, Forests and Climate Change, Prakash Javadekar has directed that 80 per cent of the CAMPA (Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority) funds have to mandatorily be used for plantation drives and afforestation.
The rest of the funds are to be used capacity building, as per the separate budget of the state. The recent Finance Commission has increased the devolution to 10% for the forest cover.
